meanings.definition: The action or process of treating something beforehand.
meanings.sent1: Before painting the walls, the pretreatment of the surface is necessary.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended a pretreatment to numb the area before the procedure.
meanings.sent3: The pretreatment of marinating the meat in spices made the dish even more flavorful.
meanings.sent4: The pretreatment of studying in advance helped her ace the exam.
meanings.sent5: The pretreatment of stretching before exercise prevented muscle injuries.

meanings.sent1: The pretreatment of soaking the seeds overnight improved their germination rate.
meanings.sent2: The pretreatment of washing the fabric ensured the dye would set properly.
meanings.sent3: The pretreatment of a relaxing bath set the mood for a peaceful evening.
meanings.sent4: The pretreatment of organizing the files made the project run smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The pretreatment of sharpening the tools made the woodworking task easier.
